data.eml:eml: Sexual morphs of Pterocommatremulae Boerner, 1940 (Aphididae, Aphidinae) with description of male reproductive system

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nowinska, Agnieszka, Mroz, Ewa, Depa, Lukasz (2017): Sexual morphs of Pterocommatremulae Boerner, 1940 (Aphididae, Aphidinae) with description of male reproductive system. ZooKeys 686: 125-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.686.14493, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.686.14493
